Kotlin is an open-source, general-purpose, statically typed programming language. It is JVM-based and may be used in all projects where Java is currently used. It may be used to create Android apps, server-side apps, and a variety of other applications. It is an improved version of Java and is completely interoperable with it. We can even mix Kotlin and Java in the same project. It blends Object Oriented Programming (OOPs) and functional programming in a platform that is unlimited, self-contained, and unique. It also enables functional twinning using microcodes. The JetBrains team created Kotlin. The language was initially launched in February 2016 after a project began in 2010 to develop it. The Apache 2.0 license was used to create Kotlin. Programs written in Kotlin do not require semicolons. This makes the code more readable and easy to understand. This language enables the interchange and usage of Java in a variety of ways. Furthermore, code written in Java and Kotlin can coexist in the same project. The type system of Kotlin is designed to eliminate NullPointerException from code. Writing new code in Kotlin will take you less time. Kotlin code is even easier to deploy and manage at scale.

BIZ BULLS is a licensing company between a Franchisor and a Franchisee. We thoroughly check both parties, analyse the project, verify its credibility, project the success ratio; Hire credible franchisees with a passion in business, responsible towards project and work for both company and franchisee growth. 

 we are the industry experts of talented beings who believe in expanding and extending opportunities in the best ways. We innovate and execute the Finest Methodology for the budding Entrepreneurs to grow their thriving business to an extent as a franchisor. We enable both qualitative and quantitative approaches to make sure that, as a franchisor, you can reach the targeted audience to convince them about your business. On the other hand, we help the Franchisees take every possible step to build a business that they desire to witness. We promote Franchisors, giving utmost value to their brand, and formulate innovative methods to approach budding entrepreneurs and expand their business as per the requirement. 

 Our vision is growing together in leaps and bounds, offering the most edge-cutting upgraded service to the desired future entrepreneurs.

.We provide a one-stop solution for all your franchise needs, from franchise advisory to franchise promotion.
.We will help you build your business with scalability and sustainability.
.We work with franchisors to reach the right audience and help them differentiate their businesses. 
.We offer the business owner a chance to operate an independent business while enjoying many significant business benefits.
.We work by the unique business model of a Franchisor and promote their brand, achieving their targeted growth quickly. 
Why choose us?
.We are here to help you with the set of all the fundamental methods which is required for setting up a business.
.We believe in charging the lowest franchise license rates in the globe. 
.We can offer customized packages for franchisees as per their requirement with our expertise.
.Our objective is to empower companies in becoming their own best business partners.
.Our team consists of market research experts who have in-depth knowledge about the industry and know how to get the best in the market. 
 Start Your Business with Our Franchise Solutions
 We are committed to your business growth and are open to a healthy and mutually beneficial association.
We value your privacy, and this policy describes how https://www.bizbullsindia.com (collectively, "we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, shares, and processes your information.

When you use the Site, we automatically collect certain information about your devices, such as information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device. Furthermore, as you browse the Site, we gather information about the individual web pages or goods that you view, which websites or search keywords sent you to the Site, and how you interact with the Site. This automatically acquired data is known as "Device Information." This Policy also applies to information we acquire from you through our surveys or diagnostic tools. Before taking part in a survey or diagnostic, you may be shown an additional confidentiality notice. Please keep in mind that if the provisions of any such survey- or diagnostic-specific confidentiality notice contradict any conditions in this Policy, the contents of that notice will prevail. We will not contact you for marketing purposes using information collected through our survey or diagnostic tools. This Policy shall apply whether you gave us the information directly or we acquired it from another source, such as a third party. Increasing safety and security We adhere to the principles of legality, legitimacy, and transparency, utilise and process the least amount of data for a specified purpose, and take technical and administrative measures to ensure data security. We utilise personal data to assist in the verification of accounts and user activity, as well as to improve safety and security, such as by monitoring fraud and investigating suspicious or possibly

In general, we utilise personal data to deliver, improve, and develop our products and services, connect with you, present you with relevant adverts and services, and safeguard us and our customers.\n ● Offering, upgrading, and expanding our products and services: We collect and use personal information to offer, improve, and develop our products, services, and advertising. This covers the use of personal data for data analysis, research, and audits. Such processing is justified by our legitimate

We may use personal data to send you marketing communications about our products and services, interact with you about your account or transactions, and inform you about our policies and terms, subject to your prior express consent. Please contact us to opt-out if you no longer wish to receive marketing-related email communications. When you contact us, we may also use your data to process and react to your requests. We may share your data with third-party partners who may send you marketing emails about their products and services if you give us your prior express approval. We may use personal data to personalise your experience with our products and services, as well as on third-party websites and applications, with your prior express consent, and to analyse the effectiveness of our promotional activities.

Benefits of Privacy Policy 
● REMOVE BLINDSPOTS OF UNWANTED ACTIVITY Monitoring the deep, dark, and indexed web around the clock using cutting-edge AI to stop hazardous behaviour before it reaches your users. 
● INTEGRATE AI TECHNOLOGY WITH EXPERT ANALYSIS Improve detection by combining AI-powered risk-scoring with subject matter experts for maximum accuracy. 
● SCALE TRUST AND SAFETY Automate your Trust & Safety processes from start to finish with moderation queues, no-code workflows, and analytics all in one simple platform. 
● ANALYSIS OF CONTENT FORMATS Monitor and detect malicious behaviour and potentially hazardous content in any format, including video, audio, image, and text. 
● PREVENT UNNECESSARY EXPOSURE TO YOUR TEAM With our resilience tools and automatic moderation, we can promote team wellness while reducing team exposure to dangerous content. GET IN TOUCH For more information about our privacy practices, if you have any concerns, or if you want to file a complaint, please contact us through email at info@bizbullsindia.com or by mail at the address listed below: BIZ BULLS INDIA BIZ BULLS INDIA @Global Coach, 1st Floor Above Tipsy Topsy Bakers, beside Himalaya Book World, Punjagutta, Hyderabad, Telangana 500016. Telephone: +91 8977-362-436

The words in which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or plural.

For these Terms and Conditions: 
• Country refers to India 
• Company (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to Biz Bulls India, BIZ BULLS Franchising Pvt Ltd., Near Nagarjuna Circle, Punjagutta, Hyderabad, Telangana - 500016.

• Third-party Social Media Service means any services or content (including data, information, products, or services) provided by a third party that may be displayed, included, or made available by the Service. 
• Website refers to Biz Bulls India, accessible from https://www.bizbullsindia.com/ 
• You mean the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.

What you can expect from us

Biz Bull India Pvt Ltd is a company dealing with franchising a brand. We offer the following services to our clients 
• Guidance in starting your own business 
• Branding your business 
• Promoting your business with our marketing strategies 
• Licensing with the government Offering support to your business in various stages of its journey

Biz Bulls branding solutions are trendy and unique in approach which elevates our Franchisor’s brand in most efficient way. We first acquire all inputs from the Franchisor about their brand, industry they deal with and the type of customers they cater, with their services. Basing on the information received, we schedule a relevant approach through our highly proficient vendors in promoting the Franchisor’s brand in targeted audience.We conduct massive campaigns for the brand awareness and elevation of our Franchisor’s products using the print, digital, social & events modules, throughout India. We also provide an exceptional in-office branding through our 500+ Franchise offices, located in all parts of India. We take complete responsibility of promotional campaigns that not only elevate Franchisor’s brand for Franchisees, but also will increase the foot-fall in franchisor’s associated business places.

We give utmost value and importance to each of our associated franchisors’ business and can understand the competence level of their business in present market. Unlike any other competitor, we assure our franchisors of incompetence, in our association, of their major product line or the base type of business that our associated Franchisors are running.Our specially designed system doesn’t allow any second associate of same or similar line of product or business, for at least a period of one year, which will benefit our associated Franchisor in their brand penetration in the market. However, as a customer always prefers freshness in service, we at least keep a year of gap in associating with similar business associate, basing on our business requirements.

BIZ BULLS is spread in almost every corner of India with 500+ franchise offices, which we can proudly say that no other competitor of our industry is reached. 500+ franchise offices with 3000+ direct or indirect full time staff are working to market each of our associate’s brands in all parts of India that will definitely leverage the market spread of our associated Franchisor in the business.Numbers always matters, in business.. And our numbers are matchless and unbeatable, in terms of presence. And our professionally trained team always beats our time-line expectations, which is one of our unique features, of our success. This facilitates our associate Franchisors a speedy penetration in market, in every corner of India.

As the Franchisor spends lacks and crores of money building the brand, it is obvious that Franchisor shall always be worried of their brand and hence will be cautious and even worried hiring a franchisee. We have a multi layered check of the Franchisee in order to hire a reliable one for the Franchisor, we associate. Our initial screening starts with a local FO, on whose reference, we register a local franchisee, who meets all our Franchisor’s requirements and then our local FDM will complete the Franchisee’s KYC, thoroughly. Then a state level FM shall verify the financial and other requisites of Franchisee and then shall be processed to BIZ BULLS HO for acceptance. Then only franchise related financial transactions & site visits be allowed. This filters the reliable Franchisees for the Franchisor who will then become the part of success, of the Franchisor’s brand.

BIZ BULLS is marked best for its documentation process, following all the local and national legalities. We thoroughly check all the agreements involved in the licensing, both sides. We also check all the documentation of both the parties to avoid future conflicts. As we are the Licensor between both the parties, we prefer internationally valid and authenticated legal documents as agreement.Simplicity and transparency are the key factors that we maintain in documentation of both parties for a better understandability and convenience. We prefer to mention each and every small & negligible detail in the agreement to provide a clear view of distribution of duties and responsibilities of both the parties. And we prefer to collect signatures on each page of documentation as an acknowledgement to avoid any future conflicts, as this agreement can change one’s entire life.

For a Franchisor, Brand value is everything to succeed in business. And on other hand, the running business value also matters, coz it accumulates the business profits. Hence our utmost priority and concern is to keep up the Franchisor brand positioning in the Franchisee outlets and maintaining the uniformity of business throughout the Franchisee outlets spread across. As the outlet location controls the business revenue, in our initial registration process itself we cooperate with the Franchisee, in finding a better location for outlet and share the same with the Franchisor through google positioning. Similarly our setup vendor is also very well experienced in providing the setup, as per the Franchisor’s business standards, under our BIZ BULLS team coordination.

A qualified vendor with handful of work experience shall be a big shoulder that can carry the entire business requirements. And BIZ BULLS is blessed with such vendors who deliver their quality service, timely, keeping the Franchisors’ standards in mind and as we deal with the long-run vendors, keeping uniformity in Franchisor designs, layouts and themes is like their routine.As per the Franchisor’s need and requirements, we offer all vendor management services through our associated vendor partners belonging to branding, set-up & interiors, events, security, recruitments, technology, accounts, legal, PR, distribution, purchases and all other associated departments as per necessity, in time.

A perfect business person can only understand the value of massive business network. As we deal with multiple types of industries, brands, vendors, partners from all across the country, we maintain a beautiful and long lasting relationship, which forms a huge business network and benefits each of our associate, massively and mutually.
